text: Robbert de Greef (27 August 1991 â€“ 25 April 2019) was a Dutch cyclist. He was a member of the Alecto Cycling Team. He won the 2017 Kernen Omloop Echt- Susteren. He also finished second in the 2019 Ronde van Drenthe. He was born in Geldrop, North Brabant. De Greef had a heart attack riding in the Omloop van de Braakman race. He was taken to a hospital in Antwerp and was put into a coma. He died more than three weeks later on 25 April 2019 of a brain haemorrhage. He was 27. ==References== ==Other websites== * Robbert de Greef at ProCyclingStats Category:1991 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Dutch cyclists Category:Sportspeople from North Brabant
title: Robbert de Greef
